name: Holographic Reduced Representation Engine
tagline: A toolkit providing a library for encoding, decoding, and performing operations on holographic reduced representations.
body:
### An Engine to automate your usage of Holographic Reduced Representation
I have designed this Holographic Reduced Representation Engine (HRRE) to generate and manipulate HRRs for you. You can use this engine to combine representations using circular convolution, as well as extract them using circular correlation.

### Authors and Contributors
Author: Grayson M. Dubois (@G-Dubois)
Mentor: Joshua L. Phillips (@jlphillipsphd)
